video_description:
Carjam Car Radio Show -- A Car Show About People
Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/CarjamRadio
Website: http://www.carjamradio.com
Blog:        http://carjamradio.blogspot.com/
Twitter:     http://www.twitter.com/carjamradio
Youtube:   http://www.youtube.com/user/CarjamRadio
Radio Show:    http://www.kclr96fm.com/presenters?id=531

Launched at the 2012 Geneva Motor Show, the Rolls Royce Phantom Series II brings contemporary yet timeless design updates to the Rolls Royce Phantom Saloon, Rolls Royce Phantom Drophead Coupé and Rolls Royce Phantom Coupé. Featuring improvements to the drive-train, ease-of-use and connectivity, the models are also the first production cars to feature full LED headlamps as standard -- proving the maxim of founder Sir Henry Royce that you should strive to "take the best that exists and make it better".
